DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the accuracy of shoulder replacement surgery in realization a computer assisted 3D planning compared to conventional 2D planning.
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy Evaluation of Shoulder Replacement Surgery
DOC.criteria: osteoarthritis or complexe proximal humeral fracture and indication for shoulder arthroplasty patients > 18years contraindication for computertomography pregnancy previous fracture or shoulder replacement of the contralateral side in case of a complexe proximal humeral fracture
